answers.answer: I had preclampsia with my first. If it comes back positive you will go to the hospital most likely because they will need to monitor you. You may have to have a c-section after that but as long as they are monitoring you you should be fine. They will take care of you. Its scary I know. The first time I was by myself and so scared but you will be fine. Try not to stress that just makes your blood pressure go up. Keep us posted
Thanks. Got my fingers crossed everything's OK.
Thanks. Got my fingers crossed everything's OK.

question: So I'm 19weeks pregnant with twin boys and started having bad blur vision and feeling Dizzy and weak. I called my doctor and they said to come and get my blood pressure Checked. I had high blood pressure with my first two pregnancies. But so far as his one its been fine until I went in today. It was very high. They did blood work and I have to do a 24hr urine test... They think it may be preeclampsia.... Any advice on this? I'm very worried...
title: preeclampsia???
